name: lib/classes/Embed.js
Embed
description: Embed data object that holds embedOptions and resulting data.

name: error
description: Will be populated with an Error object if an error occurs while processing this embed

name: data
description:
Data object for the resolved embed

__Note:__ there should always be a populated data.html property, even if the embed encounters an error while resolving.

name: oembedAPIURL
description: The provider API URL that was used to resolve the embed

name: markStarted
description: Timestamps the beginning of the embed resolve process.

name: markFinished
description: Timestamps the end of the embed resolve process and calculates elapsedMs

name: lib/classes/EmbedEngine.js
EmbedEngine
description: Resolves urls to embeds from a registered list of embed providers

name: defaultProviderDirectory
description: The directory containing the default provider classes

name: defaultProviderClasses
description: Array of provider classes included in this library

name: engineOptions
description: Configuration options. These will also be passed to the configure method of each provider instance

name: registerProvider
description:
Registers a provider instance.

__Highlander Rule__: this provider will replace an already registered provider if they have the same name property.

name: registerDefaultProviders
description: Registers all the default providers in this library

params.name: path
params.description: directory of provider classes (if not specified it will default to the ones in this library)

name: getEmbed
description: Resolves an Embed object, populating its data property and calling the callback

params.name: callback
params.description: callback to invoke after resolving Embed

name: errorMarkupNoMatchingProvider
description: Returns error markup if there was no provider that matched the embedURL

name: filterData
description:
Can be overridden/replaced to modify any provider's data before it is passed to the client callback.
*Note:* if you only need to modify a specific provider's data then there's a similar filterData method on each provider object, too.

name: lib/classes/OEmbedProvider.js
OEmbedProvider
description: Converts a pattern of URLs into markup via an oembed provider

params.name: providerURL
params.description: the URL of the provider's oembed service

params.name: urlPatterns
params.description: array of regular expressions that this provider will match

params.name: format
params.description: the data format of the provider's oembed service. Must be either 'json' or 'xml'.

name: version
description: The version number of the url-embed module

name: getEmbed
description: Resolves options.embedURL to an embed and passes it to callback.

params.name: callback
params.description: callback to invoke after resolving embed

throws.description: throws when provider API returns a non-200 response.

name: makeAPIRequest
description: Makes the requests to the oembed provider's API

params.name: callback
params.description: callback to invoke after resolving embed

name: _applyErrorToEmbed
description: Puts the Embed into an error state if an error occurs

name: parseResponseBody
description: Parses the provider API response into a data object

params.name: callback
params.description: callback to invoke with resulting oembed data

name: buildRequestOptions
description: Builds the HTTP request options (headers, etc.)

name: convertHighBitUnicodeToSurrogates
description:
Converts high-bit-value escaped unicode code points to unicode surrogate pair code points.

JSON.parse yields a parse error when it encounters unicode literals > 16-bits.
Notably, many newer emojis fall into this category.

To solve for this you need to split the > 16-bit unicode escapedcode point into surrogate pairs.

Great and entertaining explaination here:
{@link https://gist.github.com/mranney/1707371}

Algorithm for calculating surrogate pairs cribbed from here:
{@link http://www.russellcottrell.com/greek/utilities/surrogatepaircalculator.htm}

params.name: body
params.description: The raw body of the HTTP response from the oembed provider's API

return.description: The transformed body with surrogate pairs

name: lib/classes/URLEmbedProvider.js
URLEmbedProvider
description: Converts a pattern of URLs into markup

params.name: urlPatterns
params.description: array of regular expressions that this provider will match

name: isMatch
description: Determines if a given URL matches this provider

name: getEmbed
description: Resolves options.embedURL to an embed and passes it to callback.

params.name: callback
params.description: callback to invoke after resolving embed

name: filterData
description: Can be overridden/replaced to modify a specific provider's data before it is passed to the client callback.

name: errorMarkup
description: Returns markup if an error occurs resolving the embed

name: configure
description: Stub method caled by EmbedEngine. Can be overridden.

lib/classes/errors/EmbedValidationError.js
EmbedValidationError
description: Error occurs when an Embed object fails validation.

name: lib/classes/errors/UnexpectedStatusError.js
UnexpectedStatusError
description: Error occurs when an HTTP request resulted in a non 200 response.

params.name: lineNumber
params.description: Line nunmber where error was thrown.

name: lib/classes/errors/UnknownProviderError.js
UnknownProviderError
description: Error occurs when a provider cannot not be found for the given URL.
